casebody.data:
Hitch, Appellee, v. Thomas et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Hitch v. Thomas, 117 Ohio St.3d 74, 2008-Ohio-498.]

*75(No. 2007-1062 Submitted February 6, 2008 Decided February 13, 2008.) Becker & Mishkind Co., L.P.A., Pamela Pantages, and Michael F. Becker, for appellee. Robison, Curphey & O’Connell, Jean M. O’Brien, and Jean Ann S. Sieler, for appellants.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of Manley v. Marsico, 116 Ohio St.3d 85, 2007-Ohio-5543, 876 N.E.2d 910.

Moyer, C.J., and Pfeifer, Lundberg Stratton, O’Connor, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur.
